tests/BaseTest.py

00001 #! /usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 """This is the baseTest from which all tests inherit. 
00004 
00005 The BaseTest handles initialization of the form
00006     BaseTest( potentialname, element symbol, TestDependencies List, others)
00007  """
00008 
00009 #standard imports
00010 import sys
00011 import ase
00012 
00013 #import xml library
00014 import xml.dom.minidom as mini
00015 
00016 
00017 class BaseTest:
00018     """This is the Base Test from which all other Tests inherit."""
00019     
00020     def __init__(self,potentialname,element,TestDependencies=[],verified=False,*args,**kwargs):
00021         self.potentialname = potentialname
00022         self.potential = self.getASEPotentialByName(potentialname)
00023         self.element = element
00024         self.verified = verified
00025         
00026         self.TestDependencies = TestDependencies
00027         
00028     def XMLWriter(self,resultsdict):
00029         """This method packages the results dictionary into our standard XML 
00030         Format.  The layout is roughly as follows
00031         
00032         <test id='TestName'>
00033             <config>
00034                 <potential> PotentialName </potential>
00035                 <element> Element Symbol </element>
00036             </config>
00037             <results>
00038                 <FirstResultKey> FirstResultValue </FirstResultKey>
00039                 <SecondResultKey> SecondResultValue </SecondResultKey>
00040                 ...
00041             </results>
00042         </test>
00043         """
00044     
00045         #create the XML document
00046         doc = mini.Document()
00047         
00048         #Create and append the main test node
00049         testnode = doc.createElement('test')
00050         testnode.setAttribute('id',str(self.__class__.__name__))
00051         doc.appendChild(testnode)
00052         
00053         #Set the configuration part
00054         confignode = doc.createElement('config')
00055         testnode.appendChild(confignode)
00056         
00057         #set and append the potential name and element nodes
00058         potentialnode = doc.createElement('potential')
00059         elementnode = doc.createElement('element')
00060         confignode.appendChild(potentialnode)
00061         confignode.appendChild(elementnode)
00062         
00063         potentialnode.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(str(self.potentialname)))
00064         elementnode.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(str(self.element)))
00065         
00066         #if there are test dependencies, add them
00067         if self.TestDependencies:
00068             testdependenciesnode = doc.createElement('testdependencies')
00069             confignode.appendChild(testdependenciesnode)
00070             confignode.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(str(self.TestDependencies)))
00071         
00072         #creates and appends the result node
00073         resultsnode = doc.createElement('results')
00074         testnode.appendChild(resultsnode)
00075         
00076         #for every key,value pair in the results dictionary, create and
00077         #append a new node.
00078         for key,value in resultsdict.iteritems():
00079             resultnode = doc.createElement(key)
00080             resultnode.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(str(value)))
00081             resultsnode.appendChild(resultnode)
00082         
00083         #return a pretty xml string.
00084         return doc.toprettyxml()
00085         
00086 
00087     def getASEPotentialByName(self,name):
00088         """A little helper method to call ASE potentials by name. 
00089         
00090         In the future, to be extended to include KIM potentials"""
00091         calculatorName = 'ase.calculators.' + name + '()'
00092         return eval(calculatorName)
00093         
00094     def TestResults(self):
00095         """The Test Results method, runs the test and packages the result in a dictionary"""
00096         return {}
00097 
00098     def Verify(self):
00099         """Optional verify method, creates an easy to check visual verification of test results"""
00100         pass
00101         
00102     def main(self):
00103         """Main is called when the Test is run from the command line. currently runs tests
00104         and passes the dictionary of results to the XMLWriter Method"""
00105         if self.verified:
00106             self.Verify()
00107         return self.XMLWriter(self.TestResults())
